adjectives.description: belletristic (comparative more belletristic, superlative most belletristic)

entries.meaning: Of, pertaining to, or having the characteristics of belles-lettres.
examples: […]  if they do not owe their allegiance to shamanism or Buddhism, then most surely they commit themselves to some perverse form of Confucianism or belletristic foolishness.

entries.meaning: Written or appreciated for aesthetic value rather than content
examples: I had already concluded that not one of my writings was publishable, having myself analyzed the faults of my belletristic production.
